oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy of crayon print of Gilbert Ramsey Thompson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gilbert Ramsey Thompson (1812-1888) was the father of Sgt. William Daniel Thompson and Sgt. Noah Wimberly Thompson, Co. I, 46th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. He was a justice of the peace and revenue collector in Henry County, Tenn. and lived in the Mouth of the Sandy area, which has since been flooded. See items wmca072, wmca073 and wmca074.
